text: Schrobenhausen () is a town in Neuburg-Schrobenhausen in Bavaria, Germany. It is on the River Paar about south-west of Ingolstadt and north-east of Augsburg. ==Twin towns and cities== Schrobenhausen is twinned with * Thiers, France * Bridgnorth, England (since 1992)Bridgnorth : The History * Perg, Austria (since 1989) ==References== Category:Neuburg-Schrobenhausen
title: Schrobenhausen
